Network¶

Overview¶

Network Module¶

Network module contains the Network class which is used to create the simulation environment and extract data from the environment to be used in the simulation

Networks are created from INP files using the Water Network Tool (WNTR) package [1] and the adjacency list is created using the NetworkX package [2].

[1] Klise, K.A., Murray, R., Haxton, T. (2018). An overview of the Water Network Tool for Resilience (WNTR), In Proceedings of the 1st International WDSA/CCWI Joint Conference, Kingston, Ontario, Canada, July 23-25, 075, 8p.

[2] Aric A. Hagberg, Daniel A. Schult and Pieter J. Swart, “Exploring network structure, dynamics, and function using NetworkX”, in Proceedings of the 7th Python in Science Conference (SciPy2008), Gäel Varoquaux, Travis Vaught, and Jarrod Millman (Eds), (Pasadena, CA USA), pp. 11-15, Aug 2008

class Network(path_to_file)¶

Pipe Network Class¶

Parameters¶

path_to_filestr

Path to the INP type file containing the network data

property links: list¶

links is a list of dict containing the links in the network

property link_names: list¶

link_names is a list of str containing the names of the links in the network

property pipes: list¶

pipes is a list of dict containing the pipes in the network

property pipe_names: list¶

pipe_names is a list of str containing the names of the pipes in the network

property nodes: list¶

nodes is a list of dict containing the nodes in the network

property node_names: list¶

node_names is a list of str containing the names of the nodes in the network

property num_nodes: int¶

num_nodes is an int containing the number of nodes in the network

property junctions: list¶

junctions is a list of dict containing the junctions in the network

property junction_names: list¶

junction_names is a list of str containing the names of the junctions in the network

property adj_list¶

adj_list ge the adjacency list

property water_network_model: WaterNetworkModel¶

water_network_model is a wntr.network.WaterNetworkModel - allows access to WNTR methods

property path_to_file: str¶

path_to_file

to_graph()¶

Method to convert the network to an undirected graph

calculate_link_length(start_node, end_node) → float¶

calculate_link_length() is a float method to calculate the length of a link given the coordinates of the start and end nodes

write_adj_list_to_file(path_to_file) → None¶

Method to write the adjacency list to a file

get_state(node) → dict¶

Method for an agent to request the state of the network at a node level - Currently this gives the keys (node names) of the nodes that are connected to the node

Returns: State of the network at a node - currently this is the keys (node names) of the nodes that are connected to the node

plot_network(show=False, *args, **kwargs) → None¶

Method to plot the network using wntr graphics api

get_link(start_node, end_node)¶

Method to get a link from a start and end node

get_links(node) → list¶

Method to get links from a given node

get_link_names(node) → list¶

Method to get link names from a given node

get_node(start_node, link)¶

Method to get a node from a start node and a link

save_image(path_to_file)¶

Method to save png of network plot
